text: (Oh Bantu! Yesabani iNkosi yenu futhi nesabe usuku lapho engekho ubaba oyokwezuzela indodana yakhe futhi ayikho indodana eyokwezuzela uyise utho, ngempela isethembiso sikaMvelinqangi siyiqiniso ngakho-ke ningayivumeli impilo yalomhlaba inikhohlise futhi ningamvumeli umkhohlisi omkhulu usathane) anikhohlise ngoMvelinqangi
